mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Bg_Alarm (user_id, type, message, is_read, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{content}, 0, DATETIME('now', 'localtime') )
INSERT INTO Bg_Alarm (user_id, type, message, is_read, created_at) SELECT id, #{type}, #{content}, 0, DATETIME('now', 'localtime') FROM Bg_User
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, type, message AS content, is_read AS isRead, created_at AS createdAt FROM Bg_Alarm WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT a.id, a.user_id AS userId, u.login_id AS loginId, a.type, a.message AS content, a.is_read AS isRead, a.created_at AS createdAt FROM Bg_Alarm a LEFT JOIN Bg_User u ON a.user_id = u.id ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT id, user_id AS userId, type, message AS content, created_at AS createdAt FROM Bg_Alarm ORDER BY created_at DESC
